channel.title: About Me on Michael Fitzgerald
channel.description: Recent content in About Me on Michael Fitzgerald

item.title: Projects
item.description: RTI Avionics Demo In the summer of 2023, I interned at Real-Time Innovations (RTI), an IoT middleware company. There, I designed and implemented a demo suite to highlight use cases of RTI’s software in avionics. This was a fun experience: not only did I refine my development skills, from the web to the low-level, but at the program’s conclusion I pitched my project to sales engineers. Through this opportunity, I’ve learned some important lessons about computing and how the public perceives a software company.
